Telescrypts enables low resourced health clinics and hospitals to connect in real-time with their patients health vitals through a mobile platform and wireless medical sensors. Partners can input and track patient information seamlessly in addition to accessing secure patient information anywhere.

August 27, 2015, Omron was a client of Anni’s

His high qualities as an effective communicator and creative thinker have made him definitely one of the most impressive young entrepreneurs in my eyes. He is an extremely confident presenter. I have seen him delivering numerous pitches that really have its "WOW" factor. His start-up teleScrypt is an excellent example of a young start-up that has a mission bigger than $. Knowing personally him and his amazing team - I am sure they will take it big!

summary: Omron Blauo is a Tech Entrepreneur with a passion for... okay look, it's me.I love transparent startups, disruptive technology, internet of "everything", and emerging markets. I am focused on disrupting industries and high growth technologies leading me to have pitched on some of the largest stages in the world. I have successfully launched two startup ventures, developed wearable technology in an innovative research lab, and consulted for multiple technology companies.Mentioned in: • TechCrunch “Our pick of the 21 most interesting startups from Websummit”.• WebSummit “50 of the world’s most promising startups coming to Websummit”.• Joinville “5 most innovative Startups taking Slush by Storm”.• TechForGood “Meet the UNICEF Wearables Finalists”.Specialties: Wearables, Impact Entrepreneurship, Creative StrategyI’m extremely busy lately, but if you feel I can help I am always willing to set up a quick call. Contact me directly at ron.blauo@gmail.com.
